Natalya & Devon

Lodging

We recommend booking now.

The Catskills are a popular getaway destination in June and places fill up fast. The most affordable options are AirBnbs for groups and rooms at the Catskills Season’s Inn for singles and couples (discount code NATALYADEVON0616). Other charming choices abound.

MotelsAirBnbsCamping

Motels

Listed by distance. We've visited and vetted them all.

Spruceton Inn1m$$$$Hipster outdoor hotel, bring your beanie.
Catskills Season’s Inn2m$$Best price for value; discount code NATALYADEVON0616.
Slide Mountain Motel2m$Affordable, quirky motel.
Phoenicia Lodge2m$$$Cute red cabins.
Graham & Co2m$$$$Another hipster hotel with a pool further away.

AirBnbs

View West Kill, NY AirBnbs for June 15-17th

Camping

We invite you to camp at Newton Farm. There are also NY State Dept. of Environmental Conservation campgrounds all over the Catskills. Below are just the closest to the farm. Fees are per night. Reservations can be made online through the links below. Primitive campgrounds are free but they are first come, first serve.

Newton Farm0mFreePrimitive camping. Farmhouse facilities.
Primitive Camping off Rt. 2810.8mFree4 - 5 sites. Small Pond access.
Woodland Valley Campground17.8m$20-25Our favorite. Drive in campground with facilities.
Devil's Tombstone Campground18.3m$16-21Drive in campground. No facilities.
How to Get to West Kill
